item.title: Benjamin add a quote by Mark Oliver Everett
item.description: "Life is so full of unpredictable beauty and strange surprises. Sometimes that beauty is too much for me to handle. Do you know that feeling? When something is just too beautiful? When someone says something or writes something or plays something that moves you to the point of tears, maybe even changes you." -- Mark Oliver Everett

item.title: Benjamin add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "It's only after we've lost everything that we're free to do anything." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Benjamin add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "What I want is to be needed. What I need is to be indispensable to somebody. Who I need is somebody that will eat up all my free time, my ego, my attention. Somebody addicted to me. A mutual addiction." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Benjamin add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "The things you used to own, now they own you." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Benjamin add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "Nothing of me is original. I am the combined effort of everyone I've ever known." -- Chuck Palahniuk
